title: Auth Test
subtitle: Use this page to validate Firebase Google login.
loginSubtitle: Continue as guest or log in with Google Account.

loginHighlights.syncDescription: Open your diary on any device and continue where you left off.
loginHighlights.privacyDescription: Entries stay connected to your account and are never public.
loginHighlights.guestDescription: Start as a guest now and connect Google later when you are ready.

mergeUnknownError: Could not merge guest entries into this account.
signedInGuest: Guest mode is active for this browser session.

firebase.unauthorizedDomain: Google sign-in is not allowed from this domain. Add it in Firebase Authentication settings.
firebase.operationNotAllowed: Google sign-in is not enabled for this project. Enable it in Firebase Authentication.
firebase.popupBlocked: Your browser blocked the sign-in popup. Allow popups and try again.
firebase.popupClosedByUser: The sign-in popup was closed before completing login.
firebase.cancelledPopupRequest: A sign-in is already in progress. Please wait and try again.
firebase.networkRequestFailed: Network request failed during sign-in. Check your connection.
firebase.requiresRecentLogin: For security, please sign in again and retry.
firebase.authDomainConfigRequired: Firebase authDomain is not configured. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN.
firebase.invalidApiKey: Firebase API key is invalid. Check NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY.
